pull.title: gui: Favor macOS show / hide action in dock menu
pull.body: Before: After: Note that macOS toggles between `Hide` and `Show`.

events.message: gui: Favor macOS show / hide action in dock menu

events.body:
Concept ACK. Having duplicate `Show / Hide` buttons on macOS has always been a bit confusing.

Happy for this to go in before #14123, as it simplifies testing that PR.

tACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14133/commits/ee3a494f37d6a459a5d935446ba08d69ea310b9b master (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/68f3c7eb080e461cfeac37f8db7034fe507241d0): ee3a494f37d6a459a5d935446ba08d69ea310b9b:
utACK ee3a494f37d6a459a5d935446ba08d69ea310b9b, less visual clutter is great
